All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AssignmentApplication
The main entry point for the Assignment application.
Author
The Author class represents an author of a book.
AuthorController
Controller class for handling author-related requests.
AuthorRepository
Repository interface for performing CRUD operations and filtering on Author entities.
AuthorService
Service interface for managing authors.
AuthorServiceImpl
Service implementation for managing authors.
Book
The Book class represents a book entity.
BookController
Controller class for handling book-related requests.
BookRepository
Repository interface for performing CRUD operations and filtering on Book entities.
BookService
Service interface for managing books.
BookServiceImpl
Service implementation for managing books.
InitialDataLoader
InitialDataLoader is a component responsible for loading initial data into the application database upon startup.
WebMVCConfig
Configuration class for Spring MVC.
